title: Need info ?!!
content: Guys sorry ik this is not the subreddit for non Bangalore pes but there isn't anyother subreddits ,.. so the thing is, is pes mandya worth ?! ( kcet - 35k gmr category) In first round I got dsu harohalli In 2nd round I'mma got pes mandya so im asking was my decision wise choosing pes Mandya over dsu

comments.body: Pes mandya is not related to pesu bangalore. There are only 2 branches of pesu, Ring road campus and electronic city campus
Ask on r/Btechtards bro. This ain't the place.
Sorry bro ik this isn't the place and r/btechtards is filled with non kannadigas more so they don't know about Karnatakas tiers 3 collages ig
Ask there once what's the harm?

It's a decent clg with 60 seats for cse ( i live in mandya ) 
Top 35 in Karnataka in terms of placements and #12 in nirf ranking ( Karnataka)
Is pes mandya also under doreswamy? How come it doesn't have pessat seats?
LoL no. That's a different college under different management altogether.
No it's different still pes mandya is older than pes banglore
